summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Westview Drive, from West McGraw street to Eleventh Avenue West; Tenth Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to West Ray Street; Ninth Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to West Ray Street; Eleventh Avenue West, from Gilman Avenue to West Ray Street; West Crockett Street, from Ninth Avenue West to Eleventh Avenue West; West McGraw Street, from Eleventh Avenue West to Ninth Avenue West; West Wheeler Street, from Eleventh Avenue West to Ninth Avenue West; West Halladay Street, from Westview Drive to Ninth Avenue West and West Ray Street, from Eleventh Avenue West to Ninth Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 398 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
